Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Trains bypassing Sedgwick Station
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Sedgwick due a power outage in the area.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Sedgwick due to a power outage in the area.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Armitage to Chicago to provide connecting service in both directions. 

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
